titleStmt.title: The boke of knowledge: whether a sycke person beynge in peryll shall lyue, or dye, &c..
Book of knowledge.
titleStmt.author: Hippocrates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Jmprynted by me Robert Wyer dwellynge in saynt Martyns parysshe at charyng Crosse.,

notesStmt.note: Publication date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"Purporting to be by Hippocrates."--Brit. Mus. Cat. New ed.
